verses.text: Concerning the \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w* of the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*: Of the \w Korhites|strong="H7145"\w* \add was\add* \w Meshelemiah|strong="H4920"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kore|strong="H6981"\w*, of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*.\f + \fr 26.1 \ft Meshelemiah: also called, Shelemiah\f*\f + \fr 26.1 \ft Asaph: also called, Ebiasaph\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshelemiah|strong="H4920"\w* \add were\add*, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w Jediael|strong="H3043"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*, \w Zebadiah|strong="H2069"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w*, \w Jathniel|strong="H3496"\w* the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w*,
\w Elam|strong="H5867"\w* the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w*, \w Jehohanan|strong="H3076"\w* the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w*, \w Elioenai|strong="H0454"\w* the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w*.

Moreover the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* \add were\add*, \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w Jehozabad|strong="H3075"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*, \w Joah|strong="H3098"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w*, and \w Sacar|strong="H7940"\w* the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w*, and \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w* the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w*,

\w Ammiel|strong="H5988"\w* the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w*, \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w*, \w Peulthai|strong="H6469"\w* the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* him.\f + \fr 26.5 \ft him: that is, Obed-edom\f*

Also unto \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* were \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w*, that \w ruled|strong="H4474"\w* throughout the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: for they \add were\add* mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*; \w Othni|strong="H6273"\w*, and \w Rephael|strong="H7501"\w*, and \w Obed|strong="H5744"\w*, \w Elzabad|strong="H0443"\w*, whose \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \add were\add* \w strong|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Elihu|strong="H0453"\w*, and \w Semachiah|strong="H5565"\w*.

All these of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w*: they and their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w able|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* for \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, \add were\add* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* of \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w*.
And \w Meshelemiah|strong="H4920"\w* had \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w strong|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w*.

Also \w Hosah|strong="H2621"\w*, of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, had \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*; \w Simri|strong="H8113"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*, (for \add though\add* he was not the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, yet his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* him the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*;)

\w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*, \w Tebaliah|strong="H2882"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w*, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w*: all the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Hosah|strong="H2621"\w* \add were\add* \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w*.

Among these \add were\add* the \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w* of the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*, \add even\add* among the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w men|strong="H1397"\w*, \add having\add* \w wards|strong="H4931"\w* one \w against|strong="H5980"\w* \w another|strong="H0251"\w*, to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And they \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w*, as well the \w small|strong="H6996"\w* as the \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, according to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, for every \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.\f + \fr 26.13 \ft as well…: or, as well for the small as for the great\f*

And the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* to \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w*. Then for \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, a \w wise|strong="H7922"\w* \w counsellor|strong="H3289"\w*, they \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w*; and his \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*.\f + \fr 26.14 \ft Shelemiah: also called Meshelemiah\f*

To \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w*; and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Asuppim|strong="H0624"\w*.\f + \fr 26.15 \ft Asuppim: Heb. gatherings\f*

To \w Shuppim|strong="H8206"\w* and \w Hosah|strong="H2621"\w* \add the lot came forth\add* \w westward|strong="H4628"\w*, with the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w Shallecheth|strong="H7996"\w*, by the \w causeway|strong="H4546"\w* of the going \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w ward|strong="H4929"\w* \w against|strong="H5980"\w* \w ward|strong="H4929"\w*.

\w Eastward|strong="H4217"\w* \add were\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w northward|strong="H6828"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* a \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w southward|strong="H5045"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* a \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and toward \w Asuppim|strong="H0624"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add and\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w*.
At \w Parbar|strong="H6503"\w* \w westward|strong="H4628"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* at the \w causeway|strong="H4546"\w*, \add and\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* at \w Parbar|strong="H6503"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w* of the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w* among the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kore|strong="H7145"\w*, and among the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*.

¶ And of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w* \add was\add* over the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and over the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the dedicated \w things|strong="H6944"\w*.\f + \fr 26.20 \ft dedicated…: Heb. holy things\f*

\add As concerning\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Laadan|strong="H3936"\w*; the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Gershonite|strong="H1649"\w* \w Laadan|strong="H3936"\w*, \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \add even\add* of \w Laadan|strong="H3936"\w* the \w Gershonite|strong="H1649"\w*, \add were\add* \w Jehieli|strong="H3172"\w*.\f + \fr 26.21 \ft Laadan: also called, Libni\f*\f + \fr 26.21 \ft Jehieli: also called, Jehiel\f*

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehieli|strong="H3172"\w*; \w Zetham|strong="H2241"\w*, and \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \add which were\add* over the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Of the \w Amramites|strong="H6020"\w*, \add and\add* the \w Izharites|strong="H3325"\w*, the \w Hebronites|strong="H2276"\w*, \add and\add* the \w Uzzielites|strong="H5817"\w*:

And \w Shebuel|strong="H7619"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \add was\add* \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* of the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*.

And his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* by \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w*; \w Rehabiah|strong="H7345"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Jeshaiah|strong="H3470"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Shelomith|strong="H8019"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

Which \w Shelomith|strong="H8013"\w* and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \add were\add* over all the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the dedicated \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, which \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* over \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* and \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, and the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, had \w dedicated|strong="H6942"\w*.

Out of the \w spoils|strong="H7998"\w* won in \w battles|strong="H4421"\w* did they \w dedicate|strong="H6942"\w* to \w maintain|strong="H2388"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 26.27 \ft spoils…: Heb. battles and spoils\f*

And all that \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* the \w seer|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*, and \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, and \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*, had \w dedicated|strong="H6942"\w*; \add and\add* whosoever had \w dedicated|strong="H6942"\w* \add any thing, it was\add* under the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Shelomith|strong="H8019"\w*, and of his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

¶ Of the \w Izharites|strong="H3325"\w*, \w Chenaniah|strong="H3663"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add were\add* for the \w outward|strong="H2435"\w* \w business|strong="H4399"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, for \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* and \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*.

\add And\add* of the \w Hebronites|strong="H2276"\w*, \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w* and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w men|strong="H1121"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*, \add were\add* \w officers|strong="H6486"\w* among them of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w westward|strong="H4628"\w* in all the \w business|strong="H4399"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and in the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 26.30 \ft officers…: Heb. over the charge\f*

Among the \w Hebronites|strong="H2276"\w* \add was\add* \w Jerijah|strong="H3404"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*, \add even\add* among the \w Hebronites|strong="H2276"\w*, according to the \w generations|strong="H8435"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*. In the \w fortieth|strong="H0705"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* they were \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* for, and there were \w found|strong="H4672"\w* among them mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w* at \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.

And his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w men|strong="H1121"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, \add were\add* two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, whom \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* made \w rulers|strong="H6485"\w* over the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*, the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*, and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4520"\w*, for every \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* pertaining to \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w affairs|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 26.32 \ft affairs: Heb. thing\f*
